FuncDef: To clear individual routes from the unicast Routing Information Base (RIB), use the clear ip route command.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Clears this route. The format is x.x.x.x.
(Optional) Clears this prefix. The format is x.x.x.x/length.
(Optional) Specifies the virtual routing and forwarding (VRF) context name. The name can be any case-sensitive, alphanumeric string up to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Use the clear ip route command to clear individual routes from the route table.Caution The * keyword is severely disruptive to routing.
Command Default:None
